import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-myswitch', templateUrl: './myswitch.component.html', styleUrls: ['./myswitch.component.css'] }) export class MyswitchComponent { selectedCountry = ''; countries = ['USA', 'Canada', 'UK', 'Australia', 'India', 'China', 'Japan']; }
